ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable Webhooks when in env mode

BOT_TOKEN.description: El token telegram obtenido del bot en  @BotFather.

GDRIVE_FOLDER_ID.description: El ID de gdrive donde se enviaran los archivos

DOWNLOAD_DIR.description: The path to the local folder where the downloads should be downloaded to.

DOWNLOAD_STATUS_UPDATE_INTERVAL.description: Intervalo de actualizacion dejalo en 4 o 5 .

AUTO_DELETE_MESSAGE_DURATION.description: Intervalo para que el bot elimine sus mensajes.

IS_TEAM_DRIVE.description: Ponle  'True' si el  GDRIVE_FOLDER_ID es un Team Drive si no dejalo vacio.

USE_SERVICE_ACCOUNTS.description: Subir carpeta accounts al repositorio para usar cuentas de servicio.

INDEX_URL.description: Dejalo vacio o ve a https://github.com/maple3142/GDIndex/ The URL should not have any trailing '/'.

TELEGRAM_HASH.description: Tu hash de telegram obtenido de https://my.telegram.org.

USE_TELEGRAPH.description: Si quieres usar buscar con /list ponle yes o si no false.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Tu Heroku API key, desde https://dashboard.heroku.com/account.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: El nombre de la app que pusiste arriba

UPTOBOX_TOKEN.description: Uptobox premium token to mirror uptobox links. Get it from https://uptobox.com/my_account.

MEGA_API_KEY.description: Mega.nz api key to mirror mega.nz links. Get it from https://mega.nz/sdk.

MEGA_EMAIL_ID.description: Your email id you used to sign up on mega.nz.

MEGA_PASSWORD.description: Your password for your mega.nz account.

BLOCK_MEGA_FOLDER.description: If you want to remove mega.nz folder support, set it to True.

BLOCK_MEGA_LINKS.description: If you want to remove mega.nz mirror support, set it to True.

STOP_DUPLICATE_MIRROR.description: If this field is set to True, bot will check file in drive, if it is present in drive, downloading will be stopped.

SHORTENER.description: If you want to use shortener in Gdrive and index link.

SHORTENER_API.description: Fill your shortener api key if you are using shortener.

BUTTON_THREE_URL.description: Fill your URL if you are using extra buttons.

BUTTON_FOUR_URL.description: Fill your URL if you are using extra buttons.

BUTTON_FIVE_URL.description: Fill your URL if you are using extra buttons.
